Statusreport.
As it is now have more than 900 roms been released and I'm preparing the next pack.
The releaselist has lagged behind about 30 roms and I won't make the final torrent until I can verify the checksums of all of the recent roms. When the list is updated will the torrent be on air within a few hours.
Cheers!/joda

Thanks for the share.

I've converted the zips to rars and find that this saves about 300mb. Winrar has a convert feature that you can integrate into the shell. I dont think theres any advantage to keep the archives are zip since CMP can handle rar and most people will need to unpack the archives to put on a flashcard.
